title: Ethiopia Projects Regional Air Supremacy at Black Lion Expo 2026
desc: The Black Lion Air Show and Aviation Expo 2026, held between January 23 and 27 in Bishoftu, marked a transformative milestone for the Ethiopian Air Force (EtAF). This event served as the official celebration of the 90th anniversary of the EtAF, transitioning the organization from its historical roots into a technologically advanced, modern aerial force.…
